name: Baccalauréat (Bac) - France
notes: Calculators are allowed for Mathematics and Science subjects. Both scientific and graphing calculators are permitted. CAS calculators may be restricted. Calculator must be in exam mode with memory cleared.

conditional.condition: Must be in exam mode (Mode Examen) with LED indicator active during examination.
Must be in exam mode. Memory must be cleared and verified by proctor.
Allowed if in exam mode with all data erased.
